name: Bella Vista
description: Experience authentic Italian cuisine in an elegant atmosphere. Our chefs use traditional recipes passed down through generations, combined with the finest locally sourced ingredients to create unforgettable dining experiences.

menu.name: Margherita Pizza
menu.description: Fresh mozzarella, tomato sauce, basil, and extra virgin olive oil

menu.name: Pepperoni Pizza
menu.description: Classic pepperoni with mozzarella cheese and tomato sauce

menu.name: Quattro Stagioni
menu.description: Four seasons pizza with artichokes, mushrooms, ham, and olives

menu.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
menu.description: Traditional Roman pasta with pancetta, egg, pecorino cheese, and black pepper

menu.name: Linguine alle Vongole
menu.description: Fresh linguine with clams, white wine, garlic, and parsley

menu.name: Penne Arrabbiata
menu.description: Spicy penne pasta with tomatoes, garlic, and red chilies

menu.name: Fettuccine Alfredo
menu.description: Rich and creamy fettuccine with parmesan cheese and butter

menu.name: Osso Buco
menu.description: Braised veal shanks with vegetables, white wine, and broth

menu.name: Grilled Salmon
menu.description: Fresh Atlantic salmon with lemon herb butter and seasonal vegetables

menu.name: Chicken Parmigiana
menu.description: Breaded chicken breast with marinara sauce and melted mozzarella

menu.name: Beef Tenderloin
menu.description: 8oz prime cut with roasted potatoes and red wine reduction

menu.name: Bruschetta
menu.description: Grilled bread topped with fresh tomatoes, garlic, and basil

menu.name: Antipasto Platter
menu.description: Selection of cured meats, cheeses, olives, and roasted vegetables

menu.name: Stuffed Mushrooms
menu.description: Button mushrooms filled with herbs, breadcrumbs, and parmesan

menu.name: Calamari Fritti

menu.name: Tiramisu
menu.description: Classic Italian dessert with coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone

menu.name: Panna Cotta
menu.description: Silky vanilla custard with berry compote

menu.name: Gelato Selection
menu.description: Three scoops of artisanal gelato: vanilla, chocolate, and pistachio

menu.name: Caesar Salad
menu.description: Crisp romaine lettuce with parmesan cheese, croutons, and caesar dressing

menu.name: Arugula Salad
menu.description: Fresh arugula with cherry tomatoes, pine nuts, and balsamic vinaigrette

menu.name: Caprese Salad
menu.description: Fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil with extra virgin olive oil

menu.name: Chianti Classico
menu.description: Full-bodied red wine from Tuscany - Glass/Bottle
